thread.title: Theatre Royal to host dance triple-bill
thread.title_full: Theatre Royal to host dance triple-bill

title: Theatre Royal to host dance triple-bill
text:
0 comments 
AWARD-winning choreographer Mark Bruce, who has directed, danced and choreographed to international recognition brings his latest story ballet Second Coming to Theatre Royal Winchester with dance company Ballet Black tomorrow. 
Inspired by Yeats’ poem of the same name and the obscure ambiguities of Grimm’s fairy-tales, Bruce presents a hybrid fairy-tale filled with beauty and darkness, irony and humour exploring the content of the human heart, through perfect fluid movements. Share article 
This triple bill also features To Fetch a Pail of Water? by Kit Holder (Birmingham Royal Ballet) and Ballet Black’s sensational 2009 ballet, Depouilement, created by Will Tucket. 
Visit theatreroyalwinchester.co.uk or call 01962 840440. Promoted Stories Theatre Royal to host dance triple-bill Sorry, an error occurred.
